name: 101. Never Get An Escape
description: No matter how far I run, I can never escape what's inside my thoughts, my fears, and my dreams. But I've learned that it's not about escaping; it's about accepting what's inside and finding peace with it. There's no need to escape when I learn to live with the things that once held me captive.

attributes.value: yellow, pink, white, gray, blue, black
